DzOptionsFrame Class Reference
[Interface Components]

A frame for holding options which has an apply changes callback. More...

Detailed Description

A frame for holding options which has an apply changes callback.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

QWidget *  parent = 0,

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void DzOptionsFrame::applyChanges (  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Child classes should reimplement this to apply/save any changes the user may have made to the options in the frame.

QString DzOptionsFrame::getLabel (  )  const [inline]
Returns:
The label of this frame - this is used as the caption for the file io options dialog, for instance.
void DzOptionsFrame::resetOptions (  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Child classes should reimplement this to clear/reset any changes the user may have made to the options in the frame.

void DzOptionsFrame::restoreOptions ( DzRenderOptions *  options  )  [inline, virtual, slot]

Child classes should reimplement this to restore the options to those provided by the given options

Parameters:
options The render options to be restored
